docs.snippet: Despite missing most of last season, outfielder Nolan Reimold more than doubled his salary when he agreed to a one-year, $1 million contract with the Baltimore Orioles....
docs.lead_paragraph: Despite missing most of last season, outfielder Nolan Reimold more than doubled his salary when he agreed to a one-year, $1 million contract with the Baltimore Orioles.

headline.main: Reimold Agrees to Salary with Orioles

docs.snippet: MARSHALL--Jack. Died January 5th, 2013 at age 85 after a short illness. Survived by his wife Audrey. Jack was a very funny and creative man. His diverse life encompassed writer/producer/director at NBC-TV, minor league baseball player and enthusia...
docs.lead_paragraph: MARSHALL--Jack. Died January 5th, 2013 at age 85 after a short illness. Survived by his wife Audrey. Jack was a very funny and creative man. His diverse life encompassed writer/producer/director at NBC-TV, minor league baseball player and enthusiastic poker player. He was loved by his nieces, nephews and an extended family. A good friend to all, Jack will always hold a special place in our hearts.

docs.snippet: Who is Colin Kaepernick? He was introduced to a larger audience after dominating the Packers in a playoff game Saturday. An old interview with The Fifth Down sheds some light on his journey to the 49ers....

headline.main: A Closer Look at Kaepernick, Before the 49ers Picked Him

docs.snippet: Jackie Finken and her daughters have gone through different phases of mourning for their lost husband and father. But they are all determined to remember, without letting memory become a millstone....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jackie Finken and her daughters have gone through different phases of mourning for their lost husband and father. But they are all determined to remember, without letting memory become a millstone.
docs.abstract: Family of Lt Col Paul J Finken, who was killed in Iraq in 2007, is determined to remember him without his memory becoming millstone; about 4,800 children have lost parent and 3,650 adults have lost spouse to wars in Iraq and Afghanistan, and military is only now beginning to study how deaths of service members affect their families.

headline.seo: A Soldier’s Family Mourning, but Moving Forward
headline.main: A Soldier’s Requiem, Never Fading Away
headline.print_headline: A Soldier’s Requiem, Never Fading Away
